Uses of Class
boardgame.Piece

Packages that use Piece
Package Description
boardgame
This package corresponds to the game board layer.
chess
This package corresponds to the chess layer.
chess.pieces
the package chess.pieces will contain the classes that will represent each type of chess piece.

  • Uses of Piece in boardgame

    Fields in boardgame declared as Piece
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Piece[][] Board.pieces  
    Methods in boardgame that return Piece
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Piece Board.piece​(int row, int column)
    This method returns a piece belonging to the piece matrix associated with the board given a row and a column of the board.
    Piece Board.piece​(Position position)
    This method returns a piece belonging to the piece matrix associated with the board given a board position.
    Piece Board.removePiece​(Position position)
    Removes a piece from the board located in the position on the board that was passed as the method parameter.
    Methods in boardgame with parameters of type Piece
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Board.placePiece​(Piece piece, Position position)
    Put a piece in a position of the pieces matrix belonging to the board.

  • Uses of Piece in chess

    Subclasses of Piece in chess
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ChessPiece
    is the child class of the Piece class and will contain more properties common to all chess piece types.
    Fields in chess with type parameters of type Piece
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<Piece> ChessMatch.capturedPieces  
    private java.util.List<Piece> ChessMatch.piecesOnTheBoard  
    Methods in chess that return Piece
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private Piece ChessMatch.makeMove​(Position source, Position target)
    contains the piece move logic of the ChessMatch.performChessMove(ChessPosition, ChessPosition) method.
    Methods in chess with parameters of type Piece
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void ChessMatch.undoMove​(Position source, Position target, Piece capturedPiece)
    undoes a chess move. removes the piece that was placed at the move target, and returns it to the move source position.

    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Bishop
    This child class of the class ChessPiece represents a Bishop piece.

    This child class of the class ChessPiece represents a Knight piece.
    class  Pawn
    This child class of the class ChessPiece represents a Pawn piece.
    class  Queen
    This child class of the class ChessPiece represents a Queen piece.
    class  Rook
    This child class of the class ChessPiece represents a Rook piece.
